content.webTitle: The Ashes: Revealed - the secret masterplan to skittle Australia

fields.headline: Revealed: the secret masterplan to skittle Australia
fields.bodyText: Australia - Ashes - 4th Test 06 Name Hayden Line Off/4th Other LBW- Knick* from 4th stump on FF - Bumper Ct hooking (leg stump) - Dot balls (ego) - Straight catcher on edge of pitch/Extra-cover catching - Wider 1st slip. Name Langer Line Off/4th Other Early bumper - Drive man at extra (confuses him) - Catching position of Belly @ Adelaide (pace of pitch?) - If swing or turn short leg - Spin outlet is loft over mid-on Name Ponting Line Chan. [Channel?] Other Tries to impose early with drive (Knick*/drive man) - Yorker?? (LBW - Ct flicking through MW) - Pulls in front of square in air (depth) - 5th slip when 1st in - Straight mid-on - Tight cover early on - Backward point deeper if set??? Name Hussey Line Off Other Vulnerable to swinging ball - Loves to leave! - LBW early/Knicks* from 4th - Yorker?? - Pulls in front of square in air - Hits flat pull straight MW off spinners Name Clarke Line Off/4th Height Past rt ear** Other Knick* behind - Bwld driving - High early R/O % - Drives uppish through str cover/mid wkt (weak grip) - Poor puller from straight Name Symonds Line Off/4th Height Early straight** Other No feet early (LBW & ct driving) - Test dismissals Ct behind/slip, LBW & attacking spin - Bouncer essential*** Name Gilchrist Line Off/4th Other Knick* behind from close - Hits up from B/length - Around wicket - Got away with it on slow deck (Adelaide) - Gully 5 back (Bell) Name Warne Line - Other Throat bouncer (surprise) - Force back - Mix pace?? - Hits flat over mid-on v spin/sweeps flat in front of square - Extra cover close catch - Catch just in front of square Name Lee Line Straight Other Knicks* from straight - backaway cut to third man - Follow him Name Clark Line Straight Height Straight** Other: Yorker - Early bumper essential - Exposes leg stump - High bwld % Name McGrath Line Straight Other Early bumper - Slower ball - High R/O % - High spin dismissal % * Sic; presumed to be 'nick' ** Bowling height is colour coded and the document has been reproduced in black and white but where there are extra notes these have been included *** Printed in bold
